id: scenario-value-scanner-caregiver-scenarios-workplace-organizational-remote work essential for caregiver employment viability
title: Remote work essential for caregiver employment viability
description: Remote work essential for caregiver employment viability
content:
Scenario: Remote work essential for caregiver employment viability
    Given James cannot leave David alone for commuting and full workdays
    And remote work makes part-time employment possible
    When employment arrangements are structured
    Then the workplace_elohim should advocate for remote work access
    And remote work should be recognized as caregiving accommodation
    And employers should understand caregivers depend on remote options
    And workplace should support remote work for caregiving employees
    And location flexibility should be caregiving accessibility issue
